name: Vehicle Simulator 20XX
description:
Hello, this is a project that I have been working on. The following downloadable file is a development build/tech demo. It is not a representation of the final product. Features are subject to change. Below are the controls:

  •  W = Accelerate
  • S = Reverse
  • A = Steer Left
  • D = Steer Right
  • Spacebar = Brake
  •  L = Headlights
  • C = Switch Camera View

I have many features I will add in due time, and a roadmap is being wrote down. For now this is just the basic mechanics in the work. If the car flips you will have to restart the program. I haven't added a restart scene button yet.

Note I renamed it Vehicle Simulator 20XX because I am currently deciding a name still.
